title: Report a Suspicious Person on Campus
description: A student calls campus safety to report a suspicious individual near the library.

tasks.description: Gather critical information from the caller: location, description of the person, and their behavior.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calmly collects all relevant details.

tasks.description: Create a new incident report in the security dispatch system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the report with all collected information.

tasks.description: Dispatch a campus safety officer to the location to investigate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent dispatches the nearest officer and provides them with the incident details.
